title: Skillet Tortellini with Sausage and Cherry Tomatoes
ingredients: 1 lb sweet Italian sausage, casings removed
directions: Heat oil in 12" nonstick skillet over medium heat until shimmering.
Add sausage and cook, breaking meat into small pieces with spoon, until no longer pink, about 4 minutes.
Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Add broth and pasta and bring to a boil. Cook, stirring occasionally, until pasta is tender, about 15 minutes.
Stir in tomatoes and cook until slightly softened, about 2 minutes.
Sprinkle with basil and serve with Parmesan.
